posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.48 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Now when you attempt to start a chat with someone’s Signal username, it will work even if you accidentally type the “@” symbol first. Some h@bits @re h@rd to bre@k.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.47 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.48.0.630-beta

27 new commits since 7.47.0.624-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.48 [1]

  • Use ACIs with view once viewed messages [2]

  • Use Retry.performWithBackoff for profile fetches [3]

  • Asyncify Paypal.AuthSession [4]

  • Remove method that’s only used by unit tests [5]

  • Ignore leading “@” when searching for usernames [6]

  • Fix warning in view once sync message handling [7]

  • Remove antiquated filter parameter [8]

  • Fix index used when fetching unended group calls [9]

  • Remove broken optimization when marking calls read [10]

  • Remove unnecessary use of lazy var [11]

  • Fix TSInfoMessageUpdateMessages NSCoding decoder [12]

  • Remove .disabled from OWSUDAccess [13]

  • Remove unused message request epoch property [14]

  • Avoid SELECT EXISTS in InteractionFinder [15]

  • Use a smaller index when loading conversations [16]

  • convert LocalUsernameManager from promises to async-await [17]

  • Asyncify device linking [18]

  • Add safety tip regarding fake profile names [19]

  • Add " Review Carefully" warning to unknown contact message requests [20]

  • Add OWI header to AccountAttributes request [21]

  • Avoid force-unwrap in AdvancedPrivacySettingsViewController [22]

  • Tidying in Backup import [23]

  • Performance improvements to import performance for messages [24]

  • Put interaction-index manipulations inside a Bencher [25]

  • Update release notes [26]

  • Update translations [27]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.47.0.624-beta…7.48.0.630-beta

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
I am still having the same issue after linking where stickers show the downloading symbol over them or just show up as downloading but black or I have to tap download.

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.48.0/14de747db21f0d0ec959d5c35ec2900ac01571c7c4665647003c8c264989c8c7.zip

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Signal just keeps on crashing on my iPad for me :(

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.48.0/aede07c58502acc2f96f6f87691451aa6565cd691dea1119ef76422d556d2b5f.zip

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: I’m very sorry that’s happening. Would you mind finding the .ips crash dumps, and DM-ing me the most recent ones?

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.49 release.
